Date: Wed, 5 Jul 2000 16:32:15 -0700 (PDT)
Subject: - Everyone please read-Defense of Iron Fist
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Roaklin <roaklin@...>

-OOC- Okay first I would like to say I am sorry about
the mode thing any way. It's my style of writing
kicked in on auto pilot and i do use characters to
inrich what i type. I forgot about that rule until
after i sent it. I tried to unsend but it was to late.
I am sorry. Second i saw that my ship was in doubt
about letting her stay. Please note that she was
posted coming before the maximal ship arrived and I
used that to combine the two arrivals sort of. Look
this is becoming much more a head ache then i really
intended her to be. She was ment for fun.

 Look I know the ship is powerful and deadly, she was
ment to be that way to add a certain deadly element to
the game. Her mobility is over rated and way over
feared. Look I wasnt nor ever planned on galvating
around the oceans with her, simply change anchorages
time to time with maybe a trip to the poles or
something. I even asked zardus about her capablites
before i posted and he said there was nothing wrong
with what i posted, i got the email to prove it.

 Why should she be only one mobile?She while neutral
is a predcion ship and was to make a nusiance of
herself. taking part in dark experiments, going places
she shouldnt be. 

As to her firepower, come on, i know games like this,
the firepower would almost never be used to full
extent and weaknesswere built in anyway.  Besides why
use it all at once anyway, people would hate me and
the game would end becuase people were slagged. I
would be banned etc.I didn't want all this trouble
really its why i asked about creating her BEFORE I
JOINED.

  She can be defeated but think people if she is an
ocean bound vessel how does she hurt bases way far in
land? Her missiles? Maybe but then those can be shot
down, her main armament? That's a straight beam
weapon, she can't shot over moutains or into valleys.
Her cannons also cant shot around the world, they got
range but not infinte range.

  Everyone thinks she's all powerful but she's not,
she's got handicaps and achilles heels. Her water
restriction prevents access to several areas inland.
Her deep draft forces ocean voyages, she can't steam
up rivers. Her massive side also makes concealing
impossible.

  Look and after these founding messages she would be
little more then base of operations anyway. How many
stories can all of what she is come into play. Besides
her capablites make good missions for characters to.

 Here's a few ideas on missions-

 Disabling the ship's ablity to leave Earth
 Crippling her transwarp engines
 Stealing her targeting componets
 Disabling her ablity to move period
 Capturing the ship

 Like I said she was never ment to be such a head
ache, like i said i asked zardus before i brought her
if she was okay. she was to be home of the militrons,
a fitting home for a militristic race of predicons. I
am being resonable here, not a pain.
